title: [Psychology] Animal pet ownership seemed to mitigate some of the detrimental psychological effects of COVID-19 lockdown. Strength of the human-animal bond in terms of emotional closeness or intimacy dimensions appears to be independent of animal species. (PLOS ONE, 25 Sep 2020)
